recommendation.title: Reduce Crowd Density in Grocery Store Scene
recommendation.description: AI detected elevated heart rate (avg 105 bpm) and decreased focus (62%) during last session. Recommend reducing NPC count from 15 to 8 for next session.
recommendation.expectedOutcome: Reduce sensory overload, improve focus by 15-20%, maintain heart rate below 95 bpm

keyInsights: Patient shows 78% stress correlation with crowd density > 12
Focus improves by 23% in lower-density environments
3 of last 5 sessions had early exits when NPC count > 12
reasoningPath: Analyzed last 10 sessions for Emma
Identified heart rate spikes (>100 bpm) correlating with high NPC density
Cross-referenced with focus metrics showing inverse relationship
Compared to similar ASD Level 2 patients with sensory sensitivities
Generated recommendation to reduce crowd density by 47%

recommendation.title: Progress to Restaurant Ordering Scenario
recommendation.description: Emma has maintained 85%+ success rate in greetings for 4 consecutive sessions. AI recommends introducing next skill level: restaurant ordering practice.
recommendation.expectedOutcome: Smooth transition to intermediate social skills, maintain engagement above 80%

keyInsights: Consistent 85%+ success rate in current skill level
Therapy goal alignment: enhance social interaction skills
Age-appropriate progression to restaurant scenarios
Similar patients progressed successfully at this milestone
reasoningPath: Tracked Emma's greeting skill performance over 4 sessions
Identified mastery threshold achieved (85%+ success)
Matched next skill to IEP therapy goals
Selected restaurant scenario as next progression step
Configured initial settings for gradual introduction

recommendation.title: Add Safety Pause Threshold for Street Crossing
recommendation.description: Liam's heart rate exceeded 115 bpm for 45+ seconds during last street crossing session. AI recommends implementing auto-pause when HR > 110 bpm for 30 seconds.

suggestedSettings.pauseMessage: Let's take a quick break. You're doing great!

recommendation.expectedOutcome: Prevent stress escalation, improve session completion rate, enhance safety protocols

keyInsights: HR exceeded 115 bpm in 2 of last 3 street crossing sessions
High stress correlates with decreased decision accuracy
ASD safety guidelines recommend stress intervention at 110+ bpm
Auto-pause feature reduced anxiety in 89% of similar cases
reasoningPath: Monitored Liam's biometric data during high-stress scenarios
Identified sustained elevated heart rate as risk factor
Reviewed clinical guidelines for ASD stress management
Analyzed effectiveness of auto-pause in peer group
Recommended proactive intervention threshold

recommendation.title: Introduce Token Economy System
recommendation.description: Ava responds well to visual rewards. AI suggests implementing token system where she earns stars for completing interaction goals.
recommendation.expectedOutcome: Increase motivation, improve goal completion rate by 25%, enhance positive reinforcement

keyInsights: Ava shows 65% higher engagement with visual rewards
Token systems effective in 73% of similar age/diagnosis cases
Current verbal praise alone showing diminishing returns
Parent reports successful token use at home
reasoningPath: Analyzed Ava's response to different reinforcement types
Identified strong positive correlation with visual rewards
Reviewed evidence-based practices for ASD motivation
Integrated parent feedback on home success
Designed token economy aligned with ABA principles

recommendation.title: Increase Eye Contact Duration Target
recommendation.description: Emma consistently achieving 5.8+ seconds of eye contact. AI recommends increasing target to 7 seconds.
recommendation.expectedOutcome: Continue skill development, challenge Emma appropriately

keyInsights: Current target exceeded in 4 consecutive sessions
Average achievement: 5.8 seconds (116% of target)
Ready for next progression step per ABA protocols
reasoningPath: Tracked eye contact duration over last 4 sessions
Calculated average performance vs target
Applied ABA progression criteria (80%+ success rate)
Recommended 40% increase in difficulty level

recommendations.therapistFeedback: Approved. Emma is ready for this challenge. Will implement in next session.

recommendations.rejectionReason: Liam's anxiety is primarily related to unexpected sounds, not crowd density. Will focus on auditory desensitization instead.

recommendation.title: Reduce Background Noise Level
recommendation.description: AI detected stress patterns during high ambient noise. Recommend reducing sound level from 50 to 35 decibels.

keyInsights: Heart rate spikes correlate with noise level increases
Similar patterns in grocery and classroom scenes
reasoningPath: Analyzed biometric responses to environmental variables
Identified correlation with sound levels
Recommended reduction in ambient noise
